title: Paolo Banchero | Ep 146 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Paolo Banchero | Ep 146 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
New ATS episode, same epic interview. This week the boys are joined by 2022 #1 overall pick and former Duke forward, Paolo Banchero.

He opens up about playing for Duke during Coach K's last season, making an epic Final 4 run, and what it was like being drafted first overall. Plus, he talks about expectations for a rising, young Orlando Magic squad.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
